title: League of Legends problem help!
body: I have been having this problem with league of legends and it doesnt let me open the game to play. This is what the error is The ordinal 2821 could not be located in the dynamic link library C:\Riot Games\League of Legend\SSLEAY32.dll i have been trying to look for a way to fix but couldnt find anything please help me fix this problem.

replies.body:
okay I know I'm a little bit late but if you go into your files and delete the old Icon of League and Launch the new one that has .admin, this should work also this worked for me.

Hope for the best!

These dll issues seem to be popping up because something probably went wrong when you when you were upgrading to the new client. We should be able to fix this pretty easily with a few steps, but we need to make sure to follow these steps to the t.

**1)** It is necessary that you make sure you have all available [**Window Updates**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104#wq1) on your computer.

**2)** Before we start the migration process, I strongly urge you to **uninstall** any antiviruses that you have. Popular antiviruses like [AVG] (https://support.avg.com/SupportArticleView?l=en_US&urlname=How-to-uninstall-AVG), [Avast!](https://www.avast.com/en-us/uninstall-utility) and [McAfee](https://service.mcafee.com/FAQDocument.aspx?id=TS101331) can interfere with this process! You can always elect to reinstall it after the client has been patched.

**3)** To force the migration process, head into your C:/Riot Games folder and locate the **LeagueClient.exe**(it will have the new Beta Client Icon). Delete this!

**4)** Then, click on "lol.launcher.admin". This will start the migration process. Let this run to completion (when the Beta Client patches fully).

Let me know if that works!

https://i.gyazo.com/2a6964d91df85aa39513839816a722ca.png

Sorry nobody has answered yet. I'll try to help but i'm not the best. When you say open the game, you mean when you double click the client and you get that error? When you get that error is there a black screen or something?
